result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.
result.ga: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.orig: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.html: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.
result.ponchtml: A ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.eng: How long did you stay in France?
result.ga: Cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa Fhrainc
result.orig: Cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa Fhrainc
result.html: Cá fhad a d'fhan tú sa FhraincHow long did you stay in France?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a d'ḟan tú sa ḞraincHow long did you stay in France?

result.eng: How long will it take them?
result.ga: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.orig: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.html: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthuHow long will it take them?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a ṫógfaiḋ sé orṫuHow long will it take them?

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ga: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.orig: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.html: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadhNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ponchtml: Dá ḟad an oíċe tiocfaiḋ an ṁaidin ar deireaḋNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
